page.title: 20SHOPPING _ TOBERGELL
page.content:
Goods bought from mobile shops (vans filled with groceries that travel the remote country areas) can be very dear Here we compare some goods bought from a mobile shop and from a shop in Larne {ITEM MOBILE LARNE Loaf of bread 48p 44p Carton of milk 25p 22p 250g of butter 52p 45p Biscuits 44p 37p 500g of margarine 84p 75p 1kg of sugar 44p 43p Cornflakes 68p 59p Carton of yoghurt 22p 17p
{The work in this project was carried {out by the P6&7 pupils of Cairncastle {PS Ballygally,directed by Mr.W.D.Wiley {and the P5 pupils of St.Anthony's PS, {Larne, directed by Mr.J.P.Steele. }
